00021 template <class _T> _T hypot3(_T x,_T y,_T z){
00022   return ::sqrt(x * x + y * y + z * z);
00023 }
00024 
00027 template<class _T>
00028   void Put2Range(_T &value, const _T min, const _T max){
00029   if(value < min)
00030     value = min;
00031   if(value > max)
00032     value = max;
00033 }

00211 /*
00212     * Simple range
00213     */
00214 template<class _T>
00215   class Range {
00216     public:
00217       _T max;
00218       _T min;
00219       Range(_T _min, _T _max) : max(_max), min(_min) {}
00220       Range(_T _minmax) : max(_minmax), min(_minmax) {}
00221 
00222       void extend(_T diff) { 
00223         min -= diff; 
00224         max += diff; 
00225       }
00226       _T range() const { 
00227         return max-min; 
00228       }
00229       bool inrange(const _T value) const { 
00230         return (value>=min)&&(value<=max); 
00231       }
00232       bool valid() const { 
00233         return max>min; 
00234       }
00235   };
00236 
00237 /*
00238     * Minimum/maximum
00239     */
00240 template<class _T>  
00241   class MinMaxRange : public Range<_T> {
00242     public:
00243       MinMaxRange() : Range<_T>(100000,-100000) {}
00244 
00247       void set(_T value){
00248         if(value < this->min) this->min=value;
00249         if(value > this->max) this->max=value;
00250       }
00251 
00252       void init() {  this->min=100000; this->max=-100000; }
00253   };

00257 /*
00258     * Angular distance, calculated in radians.
00259     * To use with degrees, use deg_angle_dist().
00260     */
00261 double angle_dist(double t1,double p1,double t2,double p2);
00262 #define deg_angle_dist(t1,p1,t2,p2)                                     \
00263   (angle_dist(DEGRAD*(t1),DEGRAD*(p1),DEGRAD*(t2),DEGRAD*(p2))*RADDEG)
00264 
00265 /* Find M smallest/biggest values (ordered) in array with size N.
00266     * Works faster than qsort in case N<<M.
00267     *
00268     * b[M] is filled with sordered values
00269     * ia[M] is filled with indexes (in a) of this values.
00270     * both arrays are optional (but must provide required space when used)
00271     *
00272     * Inspirated by: V.L. Morgunov
00273     * Implemented by: A. Zhelezov
00274     */
00275 template<typename _t,typename _func>
00276   void SortMfromN(unsigned n,const _t *a,unsigned m,_t *b=0,unsigned *ia=0){
00277   if(m>n || !a){
00278     std::cerr<<"Incorrect Min_amp call: "<<n<<" "<<m<<std::endl;
00279     return;
00280   }
00281   typedef struct _item {
00282       struct _item *nxt;
00283       struct _item *prv;
00284       unsigned idx;
00285   } item;
00286   item x[m];
00287   unsigned x_used=0;
00288   item *head=0,*last=0,*p;
00289   if(m>1){
00290     for(unsigned i=0;i<n;i++){
00291       p=head;
00292       for(;p;p=p->nxt){
00293         if(_func::comp(a[i],a[p->idx]))
00294           continue;
00295         item *newp;
00296         if(x_used<m)
00297           newp=x+x_used++;
00298         else if(p == last){
00299           last->idx=i;
00300           break;
00301         } else {
00302           newp=last;
00303           last=last->prv;
00304           last->nxt=0;
00305         }
00306         newp->nxt=p;
00307         if((newp->prv=p->prv))
00308           p->prv->nxt=newp;
00309         else
00310           head=newp;
00311         p->prv=newp;
00312         newp->idx=i;
00313         break;
00314       }
00315       if(!p && x_used<m){
00316         item *newp=x+x_used++;
00317         if((newp->prv=last))
00318           last->nxt=newp;
00319         else
00320           head=newp;
00321         last=newp;
00322         newp->nxt=0;
00323         newp->idx=i;
00324       }
00325     }
00326   } else if(m==1){ // make result collection work in this case
00327     head=x;
00328     x[0].idx=0;
00329     x[0].nxt=0;
00330   }
00331   if(b){
00332     p=head;
00333     for(unsigned i=0;i<m;i++,p=p->nxt)
00334       b[i]=a[p->idx];
00335   }
00336   if(ia){
00337     p=head;
00338     for(unsigned i=0;i<m;i++,p=p->nxt)
00339       ia[i]=p->idx;
00340   }
00341 }
00342 
00343 template<typename _t>
00344   class _comp_lt {
00345     public:
00346       inline static bool comp(const _t &x,const _t &y) { return x<y; }
00347   };
00348 template<typename _t>
00349   class _comp_gt {
00350     public:
00351       inline static bool comp(const _t &x,const _t &y) { return x>y; }
00352   };
00353 
00354 
00355 template<typename _t>
00356   void SmallestMfromN(unsigned n,const _t *a,unsigned m,_t *b=0,unsigned *ia=0){
00357   SortMfromN<_t,_comp_gt<_t> >(n,a,m,b,ia);
00358 }
00359 
00360 template<typename _t>
00361   void BiggestMfromN(unsigned n,const _t *a,unsigned m,_t *b=0,unsigned *ia=0){
00362   SortMfromN<_t,_comp_lt<_t> >(n,a,m,b,ia);
00363 }
